meanings.definition: The fusion of gametes to form a zygote.
meanings.sent1: Hologamy is when two tiny cells come together to create a new life.
meanings.sent2: During hologamy, the egg and sperm combine to start the development of a new organism.
meanings.sent3: The science class had a hologamy race to see which pair of cells could form a zygote first.
meanings.sent4: The hologamy of the egg and sperm is like a magical dance that creates life.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing hologamy under a microscope is like watching a tiny miracle unfold.

meanings.definition: The union of male and female reproductive cells during fertilization.
meanings.sent1: In hologamy, the male and female cells join together to begin the process of creating a new being.
meanings.sent2: The miracle of hologamy occurs when the sperm and egg unite to form a zygote.
meanings.sent3: The biology teacher made a hologamy cake to celebrate the joining of the reproductive cells.
meanings.sent4: The hologamy of the gametes is a beautiful moment of unity in nature.
meanings.sent5: The importance of hologamy in the creation of life cannot be overstated.
